job_purpose: To play a key role in the development of an innovative platform for businesses in the oil and gas, mining, and heavy industrial sectors.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design and implement scalable, maintainable full-stack solutions
Collaborate on researching and defining architectural patterns and technology choices
Guide junior developers through code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions
Research and implement new technologies for competitive advantages
Take complete ownership of product features from design to deployment
Partner with product managers and designers to shape the product roadmap
Continuously improve application performance, scalability, and reliability
Implement and maintain security best practices across the stack
Design systems for large growth while maintaining performance and reliability
Improve development workflows, automate tasks, and enhance team productivity
Engage with key customers to understand their needs and translate feedback into solutions
required_qualifications: 5+ years designing and implementing scalable web applications with modern tech stacks (React/Angular/Vue + C#/.NET)
Deep proficiency in modern JavaScript/TypeScript, state management patterns, and performance optimization techniques
Experience building RESTful APIs with C#/.NET, implementing secure authentication, and working with ORMs and relational databases
Hands-on experience with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure-as-code practices
Proven track record implementing comprehensive testing strategies (unit, integration, E2E) and maintaining high code coverage
Experience mentoring junior developers and conducting code reviews
Ability to translate technical concepts for non-technical stakeholders and collaborate effectively with product, design, and business teams
Capacity to balance technical debt, feature development, and architectural decisions while aligning with business objectives
Passion for exploring emerging technologies and implementing cutting-edge solutions
Comfort with ambiguity and rapidly changing priorities in a fast-paced environment
company_details: Efficiently is an innovative tech start-up focused on revolutionizing how businesses in heavy industries leverage technology. The company is committed to developing a highly configurable platform that empowers customers to digitize their operations with flexibility and affordability at its core.
